movies.title: Black Widow
movies.plot: A film about Natasha Romanoff in her quests between the films Civil War and Infinity War.

movies.title: Birds of Prey: And the Fantabulous Emancipation of One Harley Quinn
movies.plot: After splitting with the Joker, Harley Quinn joins superheroes Black Canary, Huntress and Renee Montoya to save a young girl from an evil crime lord.

movies.title: Avengers: Endgame
movies.plot: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.
